column4: I'm looking for a way to improve disk scheduling on kubuntu...I have a box with a RAID 5, and whenever one process is doing something disk intensive the rest of the processes really lag. It's to the point that even a simple ls will take 5-10 seconds...
sync will flush all the buffers to disk, causing even more lag.
did you try using "renice" to change the priority of the database server?
